email_subject: Re: Henry Hub instead of NYMEX...
email_body: yes on 04/10/2001 07:20:32 AM To: john.arnold@enron.com cc: Subject: Henry Hub instead of NYMEX... Hi John ! My mistake again early morning... I clicked on Gas Daily Henry Hub (EOL #1107435, I buy 5,000 MMBtu/day May @ 5.51) instead of NYMEX. Could you change it to NYMEX ? Thank you and sorry again, Herve Ce message et toutes les pieces jointes (ci-apres le "message") sont etablis a l'intention exclusive de ses destinataires et sont confidentiels.
